summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BrandSlip multi-tenant B2B web app. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Critical frontend OTP verification bug prevents login completion.

ui_bugs.issue: Verify & Continue button remains disabled even after entering valid OTP
ui_bugs.details: OTP input field accepts only partial input and button validation fails

ui_bugs.issue: OTP input field with maxlength=6 not properly accepting full 6-digit code
ui_bugs.details: Input shows only first character, preventing complete OTP entry

integration_issues.issue: Cannot complete login due to OTP verification UI bug
integration_issues.details: Backend OTP generation works, but frontend cannot process verification

integration_issues.issue: Same OTP verification issue affects dealer login
integration_issues.details: Blocks access to dealer dashboard and creative library

passed_tests: Backend authentication endpoints (15/15 API tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix OTP verification UI bug. The OTP input field is not properly accepting the full 6-digit code and the verify button remains disabled. This completely blocks user login for both admin and dealer roles. Backend OTP generation is working correctly (returns dev OTP in response), but frontend validation/input handling is broken.
